title: Files
noPDFSupport: Your browser does not support PDFs. Please download the PDF to view it:
cantBePreviewed: Sorry, this file can't be previewed

shareModal.title: Share Files
shareModal.description: Copy the link below and share it with your friends.

renameModal.descriptionFile: Choose a new name for this file.
renameModal.descriptionFolder: Choose a new name for this folder.

deleteModal.descriptionItem: {count, plural, one {Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action is permanent and cannot be reversed.} other {Are you sure you want to delete {count} items? This action is permanent and cannot be reversed.}}
deleteModal.descriptionFolder: {count, plural, one {Are you sure you want to delete this folder? This action is permanent and cannot be reversed.} other {Are you sure you want to delete {count} folders? This action is permanent and cannot be reversed.}}
deleteModal.descriptionFile: {count, plural, one {Are you sure you want to delete this file? This action is permanent and cannot be reversed.} other {Are you sure you want to delete {count} files? This action is permanent and cannot be reversed.}}

addByPathModal.title: Add fromBTFS
addByPathModal.description: Insert an BTFS path (CID) to add.

newFolderModal.title: New folder
newFolderModal.description: Insert the name of the folder you want to create.

welcomeInfo.header: Welcome to the BTFS Web UI
welcomeInfo.paragraph1: <0><0>Check the status</0> of your node, it's Peer ID and connection info, the network traffic and the number of connected peers.</0>
welcomeInfo.paragraph2: <0>Easily <1>manage files</1> in your BTFS repo. You can drag and drop to add files, move and rename them, delete, share or download them.</0>
welcomeInfo.paragraph3: <0>You can <1>explore IPLD data</1> that underpins how BTFS works.</0>
welcomeInfo.paragraph4: <0>See all of your <1>connected peers</1>, geolocated by their IP address.</0>
welcomeInfo.paragraph5: <0><0>Review the settings</0> for your BTFS node, and update them to better suit your needs.</0>
welcomeInfo.paragraph6: <0>If you want to help push the Web UI forward, <1>check out its code</1> or <3>report a bug</3>!</0>

filesList.noFiles: <0>No files in this directory. Click the “Add” button to add some.</0>

addFilesInfo: <0>Add files to your local BTFS node by clicking the <1>Add toBTFS</1> button above.</0>
companionInfo: <0>As you are using <1>BTFS Companion</1>, the files view is limited to files added while using the extension.</0>
